title: Penny Dreadful, Vol. 1
description: The hit TV series is presented in comics for the first time! This prequel reveals the terrifying events that led Vanessa to try and find her missing childhood friend, Mina Harker, and exposes the true nature of the vampiric monsters infesting Victorian London. Beautifully realized by Louie De Martinis, and written by the scriptwriters of the hit show!Will collect the first series of issues published in 2016. The exact number of issues is still unknown.
author: Krysty Wilson-Cairns
